overview: On the evening of may 8, 1945, it was the announcement of the surrender of Germany. The war is so complete ? Not quite. In a small village or the clash between the germans and the americans raged all day, the 2 clans plan to get revenge... This night is going to be very long for the nurse Abby Taylor and his colleague, as well as for the prisonnieres German. No bias, the derivatives and the vice are universal ! Welcome to the universe of perverse and twisted Mario Salieri.
title: Prisonnières de Guerre
